website_summaries.verdict: Fungo bat that costs a bit more, but it'll give you an excellent level of performance for defensive drills.
pros: Provides versatility, as you can select from 34" or 37" bat, depending on your team's needs
Lightweight design is perfect for coaches to use repeatedly to hit balls for defensive drills without tiring out
Solid design that should last a while
cons: Above average price versus other wood fungo bats

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like all things, you get what you pay for. I got this in April, and just broke it in December. Hit one a little too close to the end and broke it right by the handle. Before I broke it, it had decent pop and sounded great off the bat. I'd hit 1000's of balls off of it, so it got quite a bit of use. I probably won't buy again, just because I want a little better bat... but if you're looking for a budget fungo, this is good option.
customer_reviews.author: TJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great fungo bat
customer_reviews.text: The navy looks very stylish, works great and seems durable if you use it as intended. I taped the barrel right away just to keep it looking nice.
customer_reviews.author: M47W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bat
customer_reviews.text: Great bat for the price. Wrapped tape around it and it's been going strong for 6 months at least.
customer_reviews.author: Swampman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for so I returned it
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was looking for so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Yule Green

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great fungo. Recommended to me by a MLB player who lives in my neighborhood. Really great. Will require some grip tape. I used tennis racquet tape called tournagrip.
customer_reviews.author: Goulee`

customer_reviews.title: 37" lightweight and great pop for working with outfielders
customer_reviews.text: After taping the barrel with electrical tape and wrapping the handle with regular athletic tape, I had to stare solemnly at this beauty until the snow melted. Finally, thanks to a recent bout of warm weather, I took this bat out to the field today and consistently hit 250-300 ft. flies off the sweet spot with minimal effort. The weight of the bat is just slightly hefty enough to make it perfect for work with outfielders, which will be my role this season. I highly recommend this fungo.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Morty

customer_reviews.text: First swing put a dent into the bat, not quality wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fungo!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Father's Day gift to hit flyballs to my kids. Another good quality product from Easton
customer_reviews.author: DBJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for coaches
customer_reviews.text: Hit practice with ease. This bat is very durable and makes your arms feel great after a long defensive practice! It is also a great price
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Looks used.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super slow and seems dinged up like it has been used. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: genacebob

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bat snapped in half after a couple of weeks of use. Very dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Still a great fungo!
customer_reviews.text: If I had to buy the bat over again, I would go with the 34" bat just from a comfortability standpoint. Still a great fungo!
customer_reviews.author: CJ54

customer_reviews.title: Everybody likes my Fungo bat!
customer_reviews.text: great color and you can rip balls with this bad boy, I got the longer one.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Nicely painted. Well balanced bat
customer_reviews.text: Quality continues over the years with this companies products. Nicely painted. Well balanced bat.
customer_reviews.author: Rapo

customer_reviews.title: Bat does the job and has good pop
customer_reviews.text: Bat does the job it is my first fungo and i can constantly hit the ball where it need to go . Beats hitting with a 30" easton ghost
customer_reviews.author: DOMINIC Stewart

customer_reviews.title: great bat, great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this bat for a great price. No complaints at all!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sports fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Gunner. Really smooth and just the right weight.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Grief

customer_reviews.title: Really nice fungo. I spend almost everyday with a fungo ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fungo. I spend almost everyday with a fungo in my hands for a couple of hours. This is a good one and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: m.a.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for all coaches
customer_reviews.text: Great bat... awesome for infield and outfield drills. Added a little athletic tape to barrel to help prolong the barrel. The team plays pepper with it before practice starts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The 37" is great for hitting long fly balls. It does however feel very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: msinclair

customer_reviews.title: Great Fungo
customer_reviews.text: The 37" bat is amazing. Extremely light weight, easy to swing and great accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fungo bat!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this fungo bat for coaching this entire baseball season of 2016. It has lived up to every expectation I had for a bat. Extremely flexible which allows for easy swings for pop ups and ground balls.
customer_reviews.author: Nick L.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good weight and quality for the cost. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby13

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy (made of Mapel) and hits great. I would recommend this to any coach looking for a long lasting fungo.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Fungo bat! Easy to Swing! Ball pops off of the bat nicely! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JONZ6936

customer_reviews.title: Great bat. Don't try and save the 10 on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bat. Don't try and save the 10 on the trump fungo.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Ward

customer_reviews.title: This is the best fungo I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned about ten fungoes in my 22 year coaching career. This is the best fungo I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, nice balance, just what I would have expected from Easton
customer_reviews.author: Brad Arnsmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for saving your arm from throwing pop flies
customer_reviews.text: Great bat...I can really get the pop flies out there. Although, I will and other batting coaches concur, that it takes a while to get used to hitting a fungo this long (37"). For short pops and mid range, it is a touch. For long outfield pops, this sails. Another coach has a 33" which is a little easier to control. I'm still practicing!
customer_reviews.author: S. Althouse

customer_reviews.title: great fungo. a little long for me
customer_reviews.text: great fungo. a little long for me. the length makes up for the lighter weight
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Bought this bat because I couch high school baseball and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bat because I coach high school baseball and any serious coach needs his own fungo ;). The 37inch takes a little getting used to but once I got to understand how to use it, I have had no problem hitting infield or outfield. I don't take the barrel and it's held up really, really well.
customer_reviews.author: EddieK

customer_reviews.title: Great Fungo, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the high school baseball season. Should have many more seasons of use. Half the price of an SSK bat and nearly as good. Would definitely recommend. Amazon shipped me the wrong color and the return and wait time wasn't enough to wait for them to make it right so I just kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Had a Lousiville Slugger fungo, which is usually $20-$30 less than this Easton, but I lost it last season. Saw some of the Easton's were on sale for a little less than my original LS, so took a gamble. The LS is hands down a better Fungo. This bat requires a lot more swing speed amd force to put a ball deep in the outfield, not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: angela4fsu

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good; I've hit somewhere around 5-800 balls with this bad boy and it seems to take it pretty well. There were a couple of concerning noises but it seemed it was normal. You can get quite a pop with this bad boy. It did have a bit of a learning curve because of the size, but once I got it, it was smooth swinging.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fungo
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fungo, wrapped with tape on the barrel it should last for a long time. Easy to swing for a big guy, easy to place the ball for deliberate practice. The Black/Honey color combo also looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: The Zissou

customer_reviews.title: I just don't like the design
customer_reviews.text: Not enough surface area/sweet spot and the wood doesn't feel strong and solid enough to hit balls hard to my infielders. It's NOT made poorly, I just don't like the design. Also, it's very visually appealing. This is more my personal preference than a flaw with the bat itself.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fungo
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fungo bat. Search no more, just buy this bat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a Christmas gift for a father/son who manage/coach little league teams. Apparently this is the thing to have. Needless to say, they are both loving it....especially since it was in the colors of their fave MLB team. I chose not to get it personalized because many guys tape the upper part of the bat to make it hold up better. Thus, it would have been a waste of money. The color combo was just a great personalization as far as they are concerned. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Agor

customer_reviews.title: Good bat
customer_reviews.text: First year baseball coach in need of a fungo picked this bad boy up. Light and effective. Makes me look like Barry Bonds during infield outfield.
customer_reviews.author: Jodway84

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great bat. Lighter than some which is preferred by me and the other coaches.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoeReview

customer_reviews.title: 1 part fun, 2 parts go!
customer_reviews.text: once you get used to hitting off the very long bat. you will accidentally be hitting home runs. Great for outfield practice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. First one broke on first swing. Second cracked dyring third practice.
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: "Fun"go
customer_reviews.text: Great bat. Could not be happier with it. Would definitely recommend this bat to coaches to use in every day practice
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fungo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and I was expecting something looking decent like just a some what nice looking fungo. This came and I opened it and OMG it was amazing! The colors are very vibrant and they did a great job on this bat. Only thing I didn't like was when it was shipped something happened and a little bit of paint chipped off the bottom of the bat and some black marks. I am able to live with the chip and also I can get the marks off so all in all I Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mills

customer_reviews.title: shifty bat
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first time I used it. Do not recommend buying this product. Find one at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dead within a month of use, not recommended for anyone who has to use everyday.
customer_reviews.text: This bat lost all jump off the barrel within 1 month. Used for practice inside a gym and on a field during the winter months of 2016. Maximum jump off the bat maybe 150ft at the most in its current state. Extreme vibration throughout the handle is made with every swing as well. This bat has no cracks or break in it and is completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EASTON MLF5 Maple Fungo Wood Baseball Bat, 37 in, 2021, Fungo Bat, Handcrafted in USA
product_meta.description: Constructed from rock hard North American Maple for lasting durability, the Easton MLF5 Fungo bat features a large engraved barrel with cupped end making a light and easy to swing bat. Bat Specifications Wood: North American Maple Handle: 7/8" Barrel Load: Endloaded Cupped: Yes Turn Model: Fungo Warranty: Wood bats carry no warranty or guarantee Length: 37"
